quality_assessment: Chapter has well-organized structure with index.md and 14 subsections, but most subsection files are empty or contain only TODO placeholders. The workflow implementation exists and is comprehensive (workflows/book-docs-drift.yml with MapReduce setup, map, and reduce phases), but user-facing documentation is severely incomplete. Index.md has good overview and prerequisites, but 9 out of 14 subsections are empty. This creates a massive gap between the implemented system capabilities and what users can learn.
